medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with RUQ pain and has been experiencing fever. He denies any nausea or vomiting. There have been no changes in bowel habits, with the last bowel movement yesterday and normal flatus. The jaundice, which was previously painless, has completely resolved since admission with choledocholithiasis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Significant for chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL), chronic arterial disease (CAD) status post stent, herniated disc status post surgery, benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), and metastatic melanoma with prior resections and treatment.
